about_the_game:
Original soundtrack of Please, Don't Touch Anything. Composed by blinch.

The OST contains all 17 wonderful chiptune tracks from the game in both MP3 and FLAC formats. Plus 12 hidden tracks and 3 bonus tracks specially made for this soundtrack.
